alert.note: Alert for Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 02 at 7:57PM EST until January 05 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Rough River near Dundee affecting Ohio County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rough River near Dundee. * WHEN...Until Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, County roads near Sunnydale flood. At 27.0 feet, KY 919 flood at Underwood and Clifty Huff Roads near Narrows. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Sunday the stage was 26.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 26.8 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 28.1 feet on 06/29/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued Monday morning.
